summary: Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.
cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo|Marlène Jobert|Laura Antonelli|Michel Auclair|Julien Guiomar|Mario David|Charles Denner|Georges Beller|Paul Crauchet|Marc Dudicourt|Patrick Préjean|Sim|Pierre Brasseur|Sami Frey|Jean Barney|Maurice Barrier|François Cadet|Ermanno Casanova|Patrick Dewaere|Vernon Dobtcheff|Luc Florian|Monique Garnier|Billy Kearns|Martin Lartigue|René Morard|Denise Péron|Jean Turlier|Jean-Marie Verselle|Henri Guybet|Hervé Jolly|Jacques Legras|Jean-Pierre Marielle|Julieta Szönyi
keywords: husband wife relationship|french revolution|escape from prison|1790s|prison
title: Gracias y desgracias de un casado del año II
